dialogue.speaker: taj
dialogue.dialogue_line: aww man, what am i going to do?

dialogue.speaker: taj
dialogue.dialogue_line: sim, is going to kill me for this...

dialogue.speaker: taj
dialogue.dialogue_line: apologies, but i might need some help

dialogue.speaker: taj
dialogue.dialogue_line: i sorta, accidentally closed the gate up ahead and dropped the switch behind the rocks

dialogue.speaker: taj
dialogue.dialogue_line: i can't exactly reach far enough to grab it and i don't have anything to hit it with

dialogue.speaker: taj
dialogue.dialogue_line: there has to be something around here that we can grab to hit it with...

dialogue.speaker: taj
dialogue.dialogue_line: think you could help me out?
